caption: We bought our '95 skoolie from a fellow in Pennsylvania who had gutted the vehicle & renovated it for a coast-to-coast trip. After sitting for some time he sold it to us. Our beloved friend Kieran drove quickly from New York to pick it up from PA then dropped it off to us in Michigan.
Fibonacci's reunion with Uncle Kieran consisted of a game of sunglasses on, sunglasses off.
Wonderful family friends, Carol & Johanan, have a driveway large enough for the bus and invita vehicle checkup & welding help.
Johan is a handy fellow with a stocked garage for all sorts of projects. The first bus project was to attach Fibonacci's carseat to the floor of the bus. Here Kchain links to a bracket.
